title: [Citizenship Office]
description: Translucent pale blue curtains embroidered with tiny flowers are tied back from the windows, and golden sunlight fills the room.  Reflecting the sun's ray from each corner are brass flowerpots.  A deep blue plush rug woven with images of peacocks rests in front of a desk with elaborately carved and gilded legs.  An oil painting done in vivid colors hangs on the wall behind the desk, providing a colorful backdrop for the clerk sitting there.
